About this blog:

Some time ago i decided i wanted to stop just watching tutorials and begin to make stuff by myself. Now this is the place where I put all of those things together.

My interests:

  • Science and Engineering
  • Mathematics
  • Music
  • Languages (Currently trying to learn German)

This blog is about applying programming and Data Science to those topics.

Francesco Gentile

"Eyon"

I'm an Industrial Engineering and Computer Science student from Argentina.

My engineering projects always stayed in CAD and spreadsheets because of budget. So I started making coding projects where that's not a problem.
